typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Entity as string,
		Code as string,
		Year as integer,
		{Total COVID-19 tests} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrigenDatos
OrigenDatos derive(Code = lower(Code)) ~> lower
CodeTotal aggregate(groupBy(Code),
	CodeGrouped = sum({Total COVID-19 tests})) ~> TotalPerCode
lower select(mapColumn(
		Code,
		{Total COVID-19 tests}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CodeTotal
TotalPerCode sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Destino
